title: Ip boost
body: I confirmed my email trying to get the 4 win ip boost and I never got it. I did this a couple weeks ago and it told I should only have to wait 48 hours.

replies.body: Looks like that email verification worked! That ip boost was applied to your account on 8/17, you may not have noticed the boost itself but you did get the extra IP from some matches after getting the boost.
